article_text:
Chris Christie, 53

Governor of New Jersey

The cantankerous governor has endorsed Trump and would bring substantial political experience to the ticket. But Christie wouldn’t help Trump with female and minority voters, and he would bring no geographic diversity to the ticket.
article_summary:
But Christie wouldn’t help Trump with female and minority voters, and he would bring no geographic diversity to the ticket.
